properties.CollectionHours: Mon to Sun 7am to 4:30pm. Closed on Good Friday, ANZAC Day, Christmas Day, Boxing Day and New Year's Day.
properties.BeforeYouVisit: Identify any damaged, rusty or leaking batteries and place them into your red wheelie bin. Keep the remaining unwanted batteries aside for depositing into the Battery Recycling Station.
properties.OnSite: Place unwanted batteries into the appropriate box. Batteries need to be loose, no bags or packaging.
